pr_title: Minor improvements for partitioned output buffers and operator

timeline.message:
Minor improvements for partitioned output buffers and operator

- Adds fast path for partitioning without constant arguments
- Simplify iterating through PartitionedOutputBuffer pages to one
pass
- Use known-size builders where possible

- Simplify iterating through PartitionedOutputBuffer pages to one
pass
- Use known-size builders where possible

- Use known-size builders where possible

timeline.bodyText: Can we rename split to splittedPages? It's easy to get confused on the wordsplit with Presto splits
timeline.author: yingsu00

timeline.bodyText: Wonder if you could add the same optimization to OptimizedPartitionedOutputOperator?
timeline.author: yingsu00

replies.bodyText: Didn't realize OptimizedPartitionedOutputOperator existed, added the same change there.
replies.author: pettyjamesm
